Text:
Finally seems to be properly seeded. Thanks people, and please keep it up. My internet connection here in South Africa is ridiculously slow :D

So is anyone willing to upload a torrent with the whole of season 4? I've checked and the rest of the episodes seem to be well seeded, let me know if you need any of them:
